sentences.en: A wafer of a moon was shining over Gatsby's house, making the night fine as before.
sentences.cn: 一轮明月正照在盖茨比别墅的上面使夜色跟先前一样美好.

sentences.en: Also, the PL spectral peak vary over the wafer.
sentences.cn: 而且, 激发萤光光谱的峰值会随著探测晶圆不同处而变化.

sentences.en: Cut the fennel into wafer-thin slices.
sentences.cn: 把茴香切成薄薄的小片。

sentences.en: Hot plate with silicon wafer in initial configuration ( before heating ).
sentences.cn: 加热板与矽晶圆在启始状态 ( 加热前 ).

sentences.en: In this work, RAFT grafting polymerizations from silicon wafer were investigated.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了硅片表面的RAFT接枝聚合.

sentences.en: Now people can produce a wafer silicon.
sentences.cn: 现在人们能够生产一种硅晶薄片.

sentences.en: Pit - A non - removable imperfection found on the surface of a wafer.
sentences.cn: 深坑 - 一种晶圆片表面无法消除的缺陷.

sentences.en: Primary Orientation Flat - The longest flat found on the wafer.
sentences.cn: 主定位边 - 晶圆片上最长的定位边.

sentences.en: She opened her mouth to receive the papery - thin wafer.
sentences.cn: 她张开嘴领受薄薄的圣饼.

sentences.en: She tilted back her head and opened her mouth to receive the papery thin wafer.
sentences.cn: 她仰起头,张开嘴,准备领取像纸一样薄的小面饼.这是最可怕的时刻.

sentences.en: Single - wafer processes use higher pressures than the batch processes.
sentences.cn: 单片工艺比多片工艺要用较高的压力.

sentences.en: Smudge - A defect or contamination found on the wafer caused by fingerprints.
sentences.cn: 划伤 - 晶圆片表面上的小皱造成的缺陷.

sentences.en: The method is to coat a wafer of silicon with a protective layer of silicon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 其方法是往硅片上涂上一层二氧化硅防护膜.

sentences.en: To smooth the surface of a wafer or semiconductor crystal.
sentences.cn: 使晶片或半导体晶体的表面光滑的过程.

sentences.en: Waviness - Widely spaced imperfections on the surface of a wafer.
sentences.cn: 波纹 - 晶圆片表面经常出现的缺陷.

words.tran_cn: 圆片，晶片；[电子]薄片，干胶片；薄饼；圣饼

trans.tran_cn: 圆片，晶片，薄脆饼，[电]薄片，[宗]圣饼
